SEARCH
Package com.myfinanceapp.service

Class TransactionManagementService

java.lang.Object
com.myfinanceapp.service.TransactionManagementService
public class TransactionManagementService extends Object
Service class for managing and manipulating transaction data in the application. This class provides functionality for: - Loading and displaying transactions - Filtering transactions by various criteria - Sorting transactions - Managing transaction data in a TableView - Updating and deleting transactions The service integrates with JavaFX components to provide a responsive and interactive transaction management interface.
Version:
4.0
Author:
SE_Group110

  • Constructor Details

    • TransactionManagementService

      public TransactionManagementService(User currentUser, javafx.scene.control.TableView<Transaction> transactionTable, javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<String> dateFilter, javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<String> typeFilter, javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<String> currencyFilter, javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<String> categoryFilter, javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<String> paymentMethodFilter)
      Constructs a new TransactionManagementService instance.
      Parameters:
      currentUser - The user whose transactions to manage
      transactionTable - The TableView to display transactions
      dateFilter - ComboBox for filtering by date
      typeFilter - ComboBox for filtering by transaction type
      currencyFilter - ComboBox for filtering by currency
      categoryFilter - ComboBox for filtering by category
      paymentMethodFilter - ComboBox for filtering by payment method

      Gets the filtered list of transactions.
      Returns:
      FilteredList containing filtered transactions

    • loadTransactions

      public void loadTransactions()
      Loads transactions for the current user and initializes the data structures.

    • getUniqueValues

      public List<String> getUniqueValues(Function<Transaction,String> extractor)
      Gets unique values from transactions for a specific field.
      Parameters:
      extractor - Function to extract the desired field from a transaction
      Returns:
      List of unique values for the specified field

    • initializeFilters

      public void initializeFilters()
      Initializes all filter ComboBoxes with available options.

    • applyFilters

      public void applyFilters()
      Applies all active filters to the transaction list. Maintains the current sort order while applying filters.

    • resetFilters

      public void resetFilters()
      Resets all filters to their default "All" values. Maintains the current sort order while resetting filters.

    • applySorting

      public void applySorting(Comparator<Transaction> comparator)
      Applies sorting to the filtered transaction data.
      Parameters:
      comparator - The comparator to use for sorting

    • refreshFilterOptions

      public void refreshFilterOptions()
      Refreshes the options in all filter ComboBoxes while maintaining current selections.

    • deleteTransaction

      public boolean deleteTransaction(Transaction transaction)
      Deletes a transaction after user confirmation.
      Parameters:
      transaction - The transaction to delete
      Returns:
      true if the transaction was deleted, false if the operation was cancelled

    • updateTransaction

      public void updateTransaction(Transaction transaction)
      Updates an existing transaction.
